direction.name: direction

A few feet in front of Indy...is the deadly TIGER PIT. But Indy CAN'T STOP RUNNING, or he'll be CRUSHED by the bell. Indiana LEAPS INTO THE PIT! The bell ROLLS DIRECTLY OVER the pit. But Indiana is SAFE. There is a FIVE INCH DROP from the ground, to the pit's OVERHEAD METAL BARS. Indy LIES on the bars. SAFELY above the countless TIGERS. The bells have all COME TO A STOP. They LIE around the coliseum ground. STILL. Only one bell GENTLY ROCKS. It slowly TEETERS on the coliseum stairs. It HASN'T yet rolled off. Indiana begins to CLIMB OUT out of the pit, when suddenly... ANOTHER GUNSHOT RINGS OUT. Indy is HIT. In the CHEST. He SLIPS. FALLS. Bis wounded body is SPRAWLED on the bars. TEETERING. direction.name: direction

He is about to shoot Indy...then comes upon ANOTHER IDEA. Mephisto LOWERS the luger. He gives a SWIFT KICK to Indy's ribs. Indiana FALLS THROUGH the bars. His arm SHOOTS OUT. With his last bit of strength, Indy's hand GRABS HOLD of a bar. CLUTCHING on for dear life. His body DANGLES over the tigers. They SNAP at his legs. HUNGRY. GROWLING. Mephisto SMILES. He
direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

Only INCHES AWAY. There is NO TIME to move. The bell ROLLS OVER MEPHISTO. KNOCKING him INTO THE PIT. Mephisto FALLS through the bars. INSIDE the pit. INTO the middle of the hungry tigers. Mephisto SCREAMS. The tigers are UPON HIM. The Nazi is RIPPED TO SHREDS. Within seconds, his screams are a MEMORY. A very WEAK Indiana still clutches the bar. He manages to BOOST himself out of the pit. He takes a FEW STEPS. WOBBLING. BLOOD pours from the wound in his chest. He STUMBLES. To his KNEES. His eyes ROLL BACK. He FALLS to the ground. The ectoplasm separates into several INDIVIDUAL LINES, that touch down upon EACH OF THE GORILLAS. The ectoplasm ENCIRCLES each the Gorilla's bodies. The Gorillas begin to RISE from the ground. direction.name: direction

We see that the shrunken Gorillas are actually individual HAIRS on the skeleton's body. As the countless hairs CONVERGE, the skeleton begins to take SHAPE...FORM...

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: With my city alive again...I will be able to return to the heavens. (warm smile to Indy and the others) Goodbye...my dear friends.

direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Kill them... (takes another bite of the peach) But save their hair. I will make a coat out of it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: to his knees. The HALF EATEN PEACH rolls from his hand. Onto the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Indy and Clare RUSH TOWARD Kezure. Something very STRANGE is happening to the Pirate King... His hair begins to FALL OUT. His teeth ROT. His skin SHRIVELS. His body becomes THINNER. SPINDLY. Kezure has begun to
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . He continues to SCREAM. In horrible PAIN. The Pirates STEP AWAY. FRIGHTENED. The others WATCH IN HORROR. Kezure's body CONTORTS. His skin WITHERS... FLAKES... It begins to
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from his bones. His screams FADE... His eyeballs ROLL OUT of their sockets. Only his skeleton REMAINS. It turns BLACK and CRUMBLES TO DUST. Only his elaborate clothing REMAINS. The many stolen peaches
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: of his cloak, onto the ground. The remaining Pirates DROP THEIR WEAPONS. They RUN OFF down the mountain. SCARED to death! Indiana HOLDS the half eaten peach in his hand. Betsy is PUZZLED.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Indiana DROPS the peach to the ground. He grabs his WHIP, REVOLVER and
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I thought the peaches promised immortality...eternal youth?...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The garden of immortal peaches promises life only to those who are pure in heart. (pause) Kezure was evil. His heart was filled with greed.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . Scraggy and his crew members RETRIEVE their weapons. Everyone TURNS, CONTINUING down the mountain path. LEAVING Kezure's clothes and the several peaches behind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Passengers board a large OCEAN LINER, bound for the United States.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is here. Bags PACKED. He holds a rectangular wooden crate, covered with the words "FRAGILE". The Golden Hooped Rod is obviously STORED inside. Indy is WAITING for someone. He impatiently
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: his wristwach. LOOKING around. He GRUMBLES to himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly, a HORN interrupts. Indy turns to the DIRECTION OF THE SOUND. It is SCRAGGY. He is wearing DRIVING GOGGLES. He rides a battered, bruised MOTORCYCLE, attached to a ricketty SIDECAR. The word "TAXI" is painted on the sidecar's exterior. Scraggy PULLS UP beside Indiana. Scraggy JUMPS OFF the motorcycle. Excitedly, he RUNS toward Indy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Scraggy FUMBLES through his pockets. He removes a small bottle of
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Where's Betsy?... The boat leaves in five minutes...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, Indy! Indy! I want to give you something for your journey!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . He HOLDS it out to Indy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Indy DECLINES. He flashes a FLASK OF WHISKEY from inside of his coat pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But this'll keep out all the bad spirits. Scraggy SHRUGS. They are suddenly INTERRUPTED.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Indiana TURNS. BETSY and CLARE walk toward him. Indy LOOKS at Betsy.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Take one drink before bed. It keep out all bad spirits.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Thanks, Scraggy...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) Indy!...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Indy shoots a JEALOUS GLANCE to Clare, then back to Betsy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Clare WALKS up to him. She EXTENDS her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Indy LEANS toward Clare, as if he is going to KISS HER. He RAISES an eyebrow. SPEAKING in his smoothest...most suave...
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Where're your bags?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm not leaving.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Huh?... But, you... You have to finish school.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm staying on as Clare's assistant.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But you're MY assistant.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Not any more. I'm having my credits transfered.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Why?...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Clare is a brilliant teacher.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (jealous) So am I.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes, but I don't offer a course in seduction.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You stay out of this.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Indy... I thought you wanted me out of your life...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That was before I realized how gifted...how talented you are... I mean... I could really use you...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Especially aboard ship for three weeks. It gets terribly lonely.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I warned you...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Indy, I've learned a lot from you. But it's time I started concentrating on a career in anthropology...instead of romance.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (sighs, to Betsy) You've certainly developed a mature attitude.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (hugs him) Thanks to you. (pauses, looking into Indy's eyes) You know... I always thought of you as my knight in shining armor...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (flattered) Really?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But now, I'll think of you as the Father I never had.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (rolls his eyes) Terrific.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Doctor Jones...although your libido is questionable, your bravery and intelligence are exceptional. (a smile) It has been an honor working with you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (taken aback) Why... Thanks.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You know, Clare...there's something...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (moving closer) ...something I've been wanting to do...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (closer) ...since we first met...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: forward, Indy closes his eyes to KISS Clare. But Clare MOVES AWAY. BONZO THE GORILLA enters the FRAME. BONZO KISSES Indy on the lips. Indy OPENS his eyes. He tries to MOVE AWAY. But the Gorilla will not move, WRAPPING HER ARMS around Indy. The Gorilla WRESTLES Indy to the ground. By using Gorilla HAND MOTIONS and GRUNTS, Clare manages to persuade
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to MOVE AWAY from Indiana. Indy WIPES his mouth. Clare, Betsy and Scraggy are LAUGHING. Betsy EXPLAINS to Clare.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ocean liner's horn SOUNDS! It begins to DRIFT away from the dock. Indiana TURNS and RUNS up the stairs, leading to the boat. The boat is a FEW FEET from the dock. Indy LEAPS onto the boat. He MAKES IT. JUST IN TIME. Indiana pauses... Suddenly UPSET. He realizes that he's FORGOTTEN the Golden Hooped Rod! It SITS on the dock. At Scraggy's FEET. As the Ocean Liner PULLS AWAY, Indy is about to SCREAM to his friends... But Clare PICKS UP the crate. She SHRUGS to Indy. The ocean liner pulls
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Sorry. Guess I left her cage open... she followed us.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ...FURTHER...from the dock. Indiana is HELPLESS. He CAN'T GO BACK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Clare is SOUND ASLEEP in bed. CAMERA PANS TO a corner of the room. The wooden crate holding the Golden Hooped Rod RESTS here. Suddenly, the box's NAILS begin to TWIST. TURN. As if they were being turned by
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . They FALL OUT of the box. DROPPING to the floor. ONE by ONE. The box SLOWLY OPENS. The Golden Hooped Rod SHIKMERS in the moonlight. Suddenly, the staff begins to MOVE. TWISTING. SHRINKING. It
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...turning into a GOLDEN EAGLE! The bird slowly FLAPS its wings and FLIES OUT of the open window. INTO the night. Clare continues to peacefully SLEEP.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The full moon ILLUMINATES the night sky. SHIMMERING across the ocean waters. Countless BRIGHT STARS sparkle in the night sky. Indy's OCEAN LINER sails across the water. The image of an EAGLE appears in the night sky. SILHOUETTED against the moon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Indiana Jones is SOUND ASLEEP in his bed. The room's porthole mysteriously SWINGS OPEN. The Golden Eagle FLIES inside. The eagle
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: back into the Golden Hooped Rod. The rod LEANS AGAINST the wall. The moonlight REFLECTS the rod, SHINING into Indiana's eyes. Indy WAKES. He SITS UP and sees the Golden Hooped Rod. At first, he is
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . He TOUCHES the rod...then comes upon a REALIZATION. The
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: of Sun Wu Kung FILLS the SOUNDTRACK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Indy STANDS. He turns and LOOKS out of the porthole. A DREAMY...

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) The Golden Hooped Rod will be a faithful friend. It is capable of one hundred transformations...and will always remain by your side.
